description: wrap_exception was created to wrap unknown exceptions in our base exception class which was 'Error'.  Later NovaException was created as the base for most exception classes.  These should be united into one exception tree and wrap_exception should be updated if it is still useful or removed.
title: Exceptions should be united and exception.wrap_exception should be updated or removed

comments.content: wrap_exception was created to wrap unknown exceptions in our base exception class which was 'Error'.  Later NovaException was created as the base for most exception classes.  These should be united into one exception tree and wrap_exception should be updated if it is still useful or removed.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda
